Title: BCPlayer - Game Audio API (for music made with BeepComp)
Description: Game audio API to play music made with BeepComp chiptune app. 16 channels of sound effects (WAV/OGG files) can be loaded and played on top of music.
HomeWiki:
BCPlayer is Game audio API to play music made with BeepComp chiptune app. Play music directly from text source files. 16 channels of sound effects (WAV/OGG files) can be loaded and played on top of music.

The Chiptune app BeepComp can be downloaded at:
http://hiromorozumi.com/beepcomp
